data.text: @STWCCG You claim 90% efficacy, please enlighten me how long this actualy lasts, and confirm you gain informed consent, by explaining all known side effects to each recipient, because everyone i know who has recieved their jabs had nothing explained about any adverse reactions.

@STWCCG How many booster jabs will be needed to maintain efficacy as protection wanes within weeks, natural immunity from the virus has been proven to be longer lasting and more effective against reinfection. Everyone i know who is fully jabbed has been ill with covid, some seriously.

@STWCCG What utter rubbish. Against a virus with a 99.98% recovery rate, and with omriCON mutation now even less likely to cause serious illness, why are you playing Russian Roulette with peoples health.
